title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a legitimate talisman in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a legal spell in a dream Many jurists interpreted dreams of seeing or hearing the correct ruqyah in a dream as an abundance of goodness, happiness, and praiseworthy changes in the dreamer’s life. Also, reading a legal fortune teller in a dream removes pain and brings good news in the nearby Gulf. Imam Al-Sadiq also sees in his book that legal progress is a cure for illness and relief from great fears and problems, as evidenced by unmarried people. The dream represents a relative getting married to a special and religious person. There are many, many interpretations, both good and bad, and in this article you have everything related to seeing a talisman in a dream in detail. The Sharia ruqyah in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin believes that the Sharia vision in a dream is nothing but the aspirations and dreams that the dreamer will achieve by God’s command. Read The legal ruqyah in the dreams of a married woman removes the suffering and problems that she suffers from with her husband. The legal ruqyah in a dream is a blessing in money, and abundant knowledge in religion. It is also in the dreams of the sick person a cure for illness and the release of the families of prisoners. In some places, Imam Ibn Shirin sees the legal ruqyah A blessing in life, freedom from magic and envy.Dream interpretation of the legal spell in a dream of an unmarried woman. Single people may see themselves in a dream reading the legal spell over and over again, and this vision is nothing but comfort from Almighty God and a desire to remove the fears and problems facing you.Hearing in a dream an unmarried woman Married, enjoying legal legitimacy, she loses anxiety and sadness, and this vision reflects the negative feelings that she is experiencing during this period. One may see in a dream that she is asking someone who does not know how to read the legal document related to him and that this vision saves her from evil souls, lack of money, and the legal decision that comes from Information. Source.The only reading of a legal document by an unknown person in her dream is evidence of a close marriage, family, and emotional stability.Interpretation of legality in a married woman’s dream.Legal sensitivity in a married woman’s dream is evidence of stability, happiness, and freedom from life’s problems and worries.A married woman reading a legal document in a dream is considered news. Good for an upcoming pregnancy. Reading a legal document may refer to her husband for the harm he has caused her, and perhaps envy and evil spirits. A Sharia ruqyah in a dream for a married woman can reflect negative feelings and fear for the future. Seeing a married woman reading a Sharia ruqyah for her children in a dream means stress and turmoil And happiness will come to her and to them. Interpretation of seeing the legal ruqyah for a man. A ruqyah in a young man’s dream indicates faith and piety, and if he sees himself reciting the legal ruqyah to an unknown person. It indicates a good living, abundance, and obtaining an excellent job that brings a lot of profit. Seeing the legal talisman indicates entering a private company as a project. Commercial or investment. Seeing a woman reciting the legal ruqyah for a man is a sign of good luck, kindness, and protection from magic and envy. Interpretation of seeing a rock

title: Interpretation of a coat in a dream. The meaning of a jacket in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about a coat in the dream of an unmarried girl married to a pregnant woman. A long coat. Black, brown, and white. Wearing a new coat. Wearing the jacket. The coat in the dream. A vision that carries many meanings and vocabulary that indicate real things that may happen in daily life with the dreamer. The dream of a coat symbolizes the actions that he will take. The dreamer in real life, and in most cases symbolizes the inconsistency in actions shown to others. Seeing the dreamer borrowing a coat from someone symbolizes the problems he may face due to mistakes made by other people. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a beautiful coat, or that he bought A beautiful coat, this is an indication that he will be able to achieve his dreams and ambitions quickly and successfully. Whoever sees in his dream that he is wearing a new coat, this is a sign that he will reach the highest levels of blindness or that he will achieve great success in society. Seeing a torn coat in a dream symbolizes the loss that he will suffer The dreamer, especially on a personal level, such as losing close friends or a family member. If the dreamer is an unmarried woman and sees in her dream that she is holding the jacket in her hand, this indicates that her marriage is approaching or that she will meet the right partner for her. If the dreamer is a married woman and has been married for years And she sees that she is holding the jacket in her hand, this indicates pregnancy and childbirth in the coming period. Seeing a jacket in a dream generally indicates covering up and concealing some flaws, judgments, or problems, especially if another person is holding the jacket on your behalf. A jacket in a dream also symbolizes a friend who is close to the dreamer Who will protect his interests and help him in the difficulties he will fall into, whether on the professional, social, or even family level. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the jacket he or she is wearing is very loose and baggy, this is a sign of abundant profit and a great source of livelihood that he or she can reap. If The dreamer saw a tight jacket in a dream, this is a sign of bad financial circumstances that will befall him and failure to achieve business deals for the dreamer who works in the field of trade. Whoever dreams during his sleep that he is wearing someone else’s coat, this is a sign that he will need help from a close friend, and this person will be Ready to help in any matter. If a person dreams that he loses his coat, this is a sign that he will lose his job or profession, or that he will lose large sums of money. Interpretation of a dream about a coat: A coat in a dream indicates stability because it is the main source of protection for a person from the cold and annoying weather fluctuations. But if the coat is What appears in a dream is made of linen or cheap fabric, does not mean stability, but rather indicates that a person is satisfied with his simple life in which he lives and glorifies God, and many things about him. As for the wool coat, it appears in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a coat for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees herself wearing a coat in The dream is evidence that she will marry a rich man who respects her and is happy with him. Or her engagement date may be soon because it indicates a new emotional life for the single girl.

title: The 50 most important and accurate interpretations of seeing a naked person in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a naked person in a dream? Seeing a naked person is one of the visions that we often see in our dreams, and this vision carries many different connotations and interpretations, naked through this article. Interpretation of seeing a naked person in a dream Seeing a man you know naked in a dream is a sign of confusion and psychological instability. In life in general, it may represent revealing his case and revealing his secrets. If someone is suffering from major worries and problems and sees that he is taking off his clothes, this is a sign of getting rid of the pressures and problems that he suffers from in his life. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a person naked is a vision that expresses serious suffering in Life without the appearance of nudity, but the appearance of nudity among people may symbolize that he will be exposed to a major scandal among people. When a person sees that he has taken off his clothes without being seen, this symbolizes an enemy who seeks to take him but will not succeed. Being naked in front of children is evidence of the dreamer’s bad character. As for seeing complete nudity and going out in front of people, it appears that he committed a clear transgression and sin, and this vision carries a warning to people. The dreamer of the necessity of returning to God. If you see in your dream that you are half naked, this indicates that you are committing sins and disobedience, but they are hidden without light colors. Seeing naked is evidence of the innocence of the accusations, and whoever finds himself naked by force, means that he will be exposed to a great scandal among the people, Or a sign that he will lose a lot of money and declare bankruptcy. According to Miller's Encyclopedia, nudity indicates deviance, while seeing nudity can be an expression of illness, and seeing yourself swimming completely naked in a dream is evidence of entering into questionable relationships. If you see yourself going To work while you are naked, this indicates constant criticism from friends and those around you. Al-Nabulsi says: Nudity symbolizes the enemy of man, and this is proven by the Almighty’s verse: “O sons of Adam, do not tempt Satan, just as Satan expelled your parents from the garden of Hell.” Seeing naked in A dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that this vision indicates instability in life and exposes the viewer to psychological distress about revealing many personal secrets in front of relatives. Seeing a person naked and looking for someone to cover him expresses that he is facing a financial problem and is asking for help from family and relatives. Being naked In a sick person’s dream, there is something good that expresses recovery from illnesses, but for the dead, it is a sign of a good ending. Whoever sees himself naked is happy with him and does not seek to cover up, this indicates that the dreamer has committed forbidden things and great sins, so he must cover up and seek forgiveness. As for the dream of being naked Looking at the areola area is undesirable and carries undesirable meanings for the dreamer. The nakedness of a merchant is an expression of loss of money, for a young man it is an expression of sins and disobedience, for a believer it is arrogance at work, for a prisoner the nakedness of it is poverty and humiliation, and for a sick person it is death. This is contrary to the opinion of Ibn Sirin. Seeing a naked person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a naked person. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream a naked man, a person known for his piety and good morals, this is a promising vision that indicates that this person will go to...

title: What did Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi say when they saw a dead father in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a dead father in a dream is seeing a dead father in a dream. It varies in its interpretations and meanings depending on the condition of the dreamer, as the interpretations of this vision vary, whether good or bad, but in most cases they are praiseworthy visions. Seeing a dead father in a dream according to Ibn Sirin considers seeing a dead father in a dream to be one of the visions. Desired and soothing, and there is no need to worry about it, and one of the most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin that the site will present. Various as follows: Ibn Sirin says that if the dreamer sees his father dead giving him bread and taking from him in a dream, this is evidence that he will obtain a lot of money in a short time. But if he sees that Rejecting what the dead gave him in a dream, it means that there are serious living problems and the loss of many opportunities that are at hand. If the dreamer sees that the dead father hugs him tightly and does not ask for anything, then this is a sign of longevity and blessings in life and the fulfillment of the desires that he seeks in his life If he sees that his deceased father takes something, this is a sign that he will lose a lot of money or lose something forever. If the deceased father asks the dreamer to go with him and he actually leaves with him, this is a bad sign indicating the dreamer’s death. But if he asks him to go with him But you retreat, this indicates longevity, health, and opportunities. If the dead father is seen visiting the dreamer’s house, this indicates the goodness and happiness that he will obtain soon. But if he sees that he is carrying it, this indicates that he will earn a lot of money and increase his status among people. Interpretation of seeing a father The dead son of Nabulsi. If the dreamer sees the deceased father and he is happy and satisfied, this indicates happiness and contentment and that he will soon hear happy news. If he sees that the deceased father is coming to search for someone and accompany him, this indicates the death of that person. If he does not follow it, this indicates salvation from Distress or serious illness. If he sees that he is eating and drinking with the dead father, this is a sign of the abundance of food and goodness, God willing. If the deceased father is seen crying bitterly in the dreamer’s house, this means that he is in great trouble and indicates the father’s extreme sadness over his son’s condition. And if he is seen The dead father dancing flawlessly, this indicates his high status, his good end, and his happiness with who he is and what he has achieved. If the dreamer sees the deceased father doing something worthy of praise, this is evidence that he is urging his son to do good. But if he does something distasteful, this indicates That the father forbids his son from doing this work, and stays away from these suspicions, and repents to God. If the dreamer sees that he is searching for his deceased father in a dream, this means that he is searching for some of his affairs in reality, such as his path, his approach, and what he left for him. If he sees that he is digging In the bones of his dead father, this indicates that he is spending his money to no avail, and his interest belongs to himself only. And whoever sees his father smiling at him, this indicates his satisfaction with him and his actions and behavior in life, and the vision shows that the father is taking care of his son from his other resting place. Read also: Learn the interpretation Hunting in a dream and its meaning in detail. Seeing a dead father in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees her dead father, it is harmful

title: Interpretation of the meaning of a dream about carrots: In a dream, seeing yourself eating carrots

preview.html: We present to you Ibn Sirin’s dream of carrots for a single and married girl and a pregnant woman, cooked, grated, cutting carrots, carrot juice, and carrots. Seeing carrots in a dream: Carrots in a dream indicate kindness and comfort for those who have faced problems and some difficulties. Red carrots indicate some fatigue and comfort for those who were in danger and improved health and comfort for those Patients: A dream about yellow carrots indicates fatigue and the complexity of some things, and a dream about rotten carrots indicates exhaustion, fatigue, and anxiety. Seeing carrots indicates goodness, justice, and relief from worries. A dream about carrot juice or drinking carrot juice indicates kindness, good things, changing circumstances, and relief from worries. A dream about peeling carrots or grated carrots indicates a good reputation. And kind words, facilitating some matters, and providing relief to those who are worried. The dream of cutting carrots indicates some difficulties and the complexity of some things. The dream of planting carrots or planting carrots indicates good and changed circumstances. The dream of buying carrots bodes well, resolving some disputes and facilitating internal affairs. The dream of pickled carrots indicates fatigue and some fears. A dream about cooked carrots indicates kindness, ease of dealing, fairness in matters, and relief from worries. A dream about carrots for a pregnant woman indicates kindness, strength, improved health, and conflict resolution. Carrots in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great sheikh and scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin said that the appearance of carrots in the dreamer’s dream has a bad connotation, so eating carrots or holding carrots or Eating carrots indicates anxiety and sadness, and whoever dreams of carrots inside. In his hand, this reflects the suffering he is going through now and that things will improve, God willing. As for whoever sees himself eating carrots or buying them in a dream, this is evidence of the goodness and benefit that will accrue to him. Carrots in a dream Nabulsi As for the translator, the scholar Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, he said that carrots in a dream indicate boredom or stopping something. The person himself eats it and gnaws it. Carrots in a dream for the poor and the poor are a sign of goodness and benefit, if they taste delicious and taste good. Carrot juice in a dreamIn general, seeing juice in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, and you can learn more about the indicators related to seeing juice in a dream by looking To the topic of juice in a dream, where you will find a suitable interpretation for that. As for drinking carrot juice in a dream, Ibn Sirin said: It is a sign of wealth and relief in a dream for the afflicted and needy, a sign of recovery in a sick person’s dream, and repayment of debt in a dream. The debtor and marriage in the dream of the unmarried, success and success in the dream of the student, the student and the fortuneteller giving carrot juice to his friends or relatives in the dream. The dream shows money and a high position in society. Carrots in one dream. As for the interpretation of seeing carrots in the dream of the unmarried man or woman, if he sees a woman in her dream as if she is buying Carrots, this is a sign of relief and renewal of her hope for something she is desperate for. . Especially if the taste of carrots is good and sweet. Sometimes carrots in a dream for a single woman indicate money or recovery, and it is not good to see carrots scattered around you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting long hair for a married woman

preview.html: If a married woman wears her long, tangled hair in a dream, this means an end to the problems she is going through in this period of her life, God willing. We also explain cutting long hair in detail through an interpreter’s website. . So follow us. Interpretation of seeing long hair cut in a dream for a single girl. title: Interpretation of dreams that I pulled out my teeth with my hands without pain, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I pulled my teeth out with my hands without pain. This indicates many meanings and interpretations that differ from one person to another due to the different events that occur during the vision, as well as the situation in which the viewer is and the different judgments or circumstances that he may experience, and through our article we will explain the most important interpretations shown in this vision in In all cases. I dreamed that I pulled my teeth out with my hands without pain. Seeing a tooth coming out in a dream means that the dreamer will overcome the difficulties he is currently going through and live in peace. Seeing a tooth coming out in a dream with a large amount of blood coming out means that the dreamer will suffer from some shocks during this period, Which will make him feel very sad. Whoever sees in a dream that a stranger is extracting his tooth without pain, this is evidence that there is someone next to him who supports him in all circumstances and helps him overcome all crises. Having a tooth extracted in a dream and feeling sad about it is a sign of the psychological state that He is currently experiencing the need for help. Seeing a single woman in a dream that someone she knows is pulling her tooth means that she will soon hear some good news. I dreamed that I extracted my teeth with my hands without pain according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing an extracted tooth in a dream is evidence of the suffering that the dreamer experienced. During this period and not being able to get rid of it in any way. Seeing a tooth coming out without pain in a dream indicates that there are constantly negative thoughts in the dreamer’s head, which causes him constant tension and pressure. Seeing someone in a dream that he is pulling his own tooth means that he will face a big problem. And he will need help. Seeing a tooth pulled out and feeling afraid, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, indicates that you are facing some difficult financial crises. I dreamed that I pulled out my teeth with my own hands without pain. Seeing a single molar pulled out by hand in a dream means that she will assume various responsibilities that will cause her extreme fatigue. If she sees a woman who is not... For a married woman in her dream that a stranger is extracting her tooth with his hand, this is evidence that she will get rid of some of the problems she is going through with the help of someone. Seeing a tooth being extracted manually in a dream with a lot of blood inside it is a sign of the psychological state that she is currently suffering from and the difficulty of dealing with it. It indicates Removing a tooth in a dream and feeling afraid indicates that there are many fears that threaten the lives of single people and you do not know how to get rid of them. Seeing a tooth coming out in a dream and feeling happy means that a single woman will soon achieve a big dream for her. I dreamed that I extracted my teeth with my hands without pain. Seeing that teeth are extracted manually without pain For a married woman in a dream, it means that she will soon live a calm, carefree life and feel happy. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is extracting her tooth with her hand and feels pain, this indicates that she will soon suffer from severe sadness as a result of some trauma. Seeing a tooth removed by hand in a painless dream For a married woman, it is a sign of weakness and relief from the financial hardship that she is currently experiencing. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband is pulling her tooth violently and crying, this is evidence of tension.

title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing a prayer rug in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing a prayer rug in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about stealing a prayer rug in a dream, and we found that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know an interpretation for, let us get to know the interpretations of the scholars working for this dream, and the reader should know that the officials on the site do not They make interpretations, rather they are from the heart, interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about stealing a prayer rug in a dream. Stealing a prayer rug in a dream may indicate that he is away from worship in those days, and God knows best. If someone sees himself stealing prayer rugs, this may indicate waste. Precious opportunities and he must ask God for help. If a person sees himself stealing prayer rugs in a dream, this may indicate his inability to bear his responsibilities during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a green carpet in a dream. Everyone who sees a green carpet in his dream may indicate Indicates that he will hear happy news in the coming days, thanks to God. Dreaming of a green carpet in a dream may indicate the marital and family stability that they enjoy during this time, and God knows best. In the case of a person, a green carpet may indicate the end of a financial crisis that the dreamer has suffered for a while. Long. A dream of a green carpet in a man’s dream may indicate that God’s grace will facilitate his affairs and circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream. Seeing girls laying a carpet in a dream may indicate the lawful ruling that the dreamer may obtain during this period, and God knows best. In If a person sees making carpets in a dream, this may indicate that he is a person who is approaching God, Blessed and Almighty, and performs many acts of worship. Seeing a person making carpets may indicate that he is a religious, moral person, thanks to God. Dreaming of years of carpet in a dream may indicate great material gains. The dreamer may acquire it during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a carpet in a dream: A person’s dream that he is cleaning carpets may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams, thanks to God. In the case of seeing carpet sweeping in a dream, this may indicate a high position that the dreamer may reach during This period, and God knows best. In the case of a vision of sweeping carpets in a dream, it may indicate the unresolved problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life and during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing carpets in a dream indicates the desire to fulfill the dreams and aspirations of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of sitting on the carpet in a dream Sitting on the carpet in a dream may mean traveling on Umrah or Hajj for the sake of insight, thanks to God. A person’s dream that he was sitting on a folded carpet may indicate that he is going through a major crisis that will pass for a period of time. In the event that there is a person sitting on the carpet in... In a dream, this may indicate happy dreams that may occur to the visionary on those days, thanks to God. Seeing sitting on the carpet in a dream could indicate the end of the financial problems and debts that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of facial hair in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: And what do interpreters think about seeing facial hair in a dream? This is what we will learn in this article from our interpreter website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream for a single girl. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream as if her face is full of thick hair means that she is going through a difficult period in her life. It means that he will really face problems and crises in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a single girl with thick hair on her face in a dream. Because you do not feel comfortable psychologically and you are always worried during this period. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream cleaning her face of thick hair is evidence of her relationship. The friend is a good person. The dream also indicates that she is going through a happy period in her life. Removing facial hair in a dream for an unmarried girl in a difficult way is evidence of her ability to endure a difficult period in her life. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream, and the abundance of facial hair, is evidence of many One of the secrets that fill her life. A lot of hair, when seen in an unmarried girl’s dream, shows her ability to be patient and decisive in the affairs of her life. She is also a strong personality who does not like to depend on others. Plucking an unmarried girl’s hair in a dream, because it is a lot, is evidence A large amount of waste in reality. Thick hair is a source of anxiety and a problem, and removing it alleviates those worries. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair removal for individual legs. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman with thick hair on her face. She says that she went through a period of worries. And crises with her husband. Long, thick hair noticeable on the face of a married woman in her dream. It indicates her separation from her husband to the point of divorce, and God knows best. A married woman sees in her dream that her facial hair has become like men’s hair. Evidence of the strength of her character to endure problems and get rid of them. Hair removal The natural face in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her health. It is prominent among people with good morals and kindness. Seeing a married woman in her dream removing her facial hair, for the sake of her husband. Proof of good reputation and proof of the love of the people around her. The dream also shows the husband’s love for her. Interpretation of seeing facial hair In a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a married man in a dream with a lot of facial hair is evidence of his good morals among people. The vision indicates that he is a person dedicated to obeying God and following the Sunnah of His Prophet. Seeing a married man with very thick facial hair in a dream is evidence of the high status that he will soon acquire. Hair Thick hair in a married man’s dream indicates that this person loves helping others. A married man who removes thick hair with a razor in his dream is evidence of his efforts to achieve his goals. Either thick hair spreads across the man’s face is evidence of the presence of haters around him. A man shaking his hair in a dream is evidence If a pregnant woman sees a lot of hair on her face in her dream, this indicates a difficult period during pregnancy. Sight also indicates the presence of health problems for the mother or the fetus, and God knows best. As Thick hair in a pregnant woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a small child according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a small child in a dream, for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for divorced women, for men, for a young male, laughing or crying, carrying a newborn, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Seeing a small child in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is one of the dreams that causes great joy and happiness for whoever sees it in his dream. Whether for men or women, whether single or married, children are decoration. Of worldly life, and among the things that bring great joy to people in the case of having a new child, as married people are at the beginning of their lives, their first request is to have a new child, so the constant thought of the child and when pregnancy will occur is for joy in this world, and the mind The subconscious thinks primarily about giving birth to a child. Interpretation of a small child in a dream. Whoever dreams that he presents a small child with a beautiful face, it is interpreted in two ways: kingship and good news if he does not carry her in his arms. And whoever dreams: that he is carrying a small child, then it means worry and sadness. It was said: If he is afraid, he will be safe, and whoever dreams: that he is carrying a small child, then he will be worried and sad. He saw that it is carried unrestricted, it is interpreted in four ways: loss of money, imprisonment, illness, loss of mind, and if he sees that he is poor, then he will live in the most hateful eternity. Whoever sees: a familiar little boy playing is not Mahmoud, and if he is playing to discover what will happen to him as a result The opposite is true. And whoever sees: A young boy is one of the elders, and he grabs him and takes his home, then it is the acquisition of money and blessings. Whoever sees: A young boy is lost, then it is the loss of his worries, and it is said: The mind is disturbed. One of the most beautiful dreams is to see a child hugging a small child in... A beautiful dream that girls see, and its interpretation is good and praiseworthy for whoever sees it. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a child in a dream with different interpretations. Interpretation of a small child in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a small child in a dream is a sign of happiness, kindness, and blessing for the person. If a poor person sees a child in In a dream, this is evidence that money and food will come to him. A rich man who sees a child in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundant living. Hugging a child in a dream is evidence of the abundance of money coming to someone in the near future. Seeing a woman hugging a child in a dream indicates a burden. Heavy to bear. A small child in a woman’s dream is a sign of fatigue. Seeing a young girl in a dream is a good sign after fatigue. Seeing a married woman with a small child in her arms in a dream is evidence that she will give birth to a child in the coming period. But seeing an unmarried pregnant woman In a dream, it is evidence that her husband is righteous. Seeing a small child in a dream is a sign of fatigue and difficulty coming to the person. Seeing a male child in a dream is evidence that you are entering into problems and pain that will befall the person. A male child in a dream is evidence that the person is worried and comes to him. With more worry and anxiety. Seeing a young child crying in a dream is a sign of sadness and grief for the person. If a woman sees a child crying in a dream, this indicates a lot of sadness. A woman who sees a living male child in a dream is evidence of a non-serious illness. When a married woman sees a beautiful child in a dream, this is evidence that she will give birth
